# 💻 Quick tables

Description Code
Settings 
 
app.set('x', 'yyy')
app.get('x') ..'yyy'
app.enable('trust proxy')
app.disable('trust proxy')
app.enabled('trust proxy')  // true
Request 
 
// GET  /user/tj
req.path         ///user/tj
req.url          ///user/tj
req.xhr          //rue|fals
req.method       //GET
req.params
req.params.name  //tj
req.params[0]
Settings 
 
app.set('x', 'yyy')
app.get('x') ..'yyy'
app.enable('trust proxy')
app.disable('trust proxy')
app.enabled('trust proxy')  // true
Request 
 
// GET /search?q=tobi+ferret
req.query.q // tobi ferret
Cookies 
 
req.cookies
Response | Redirect 
 
res.redirect('/')
res.redirect(301, '/')
Response | Set 
 
res.set('Content-Type', 'text/html')
Response | Send 
 
res.send('hi')
res.send(200, 'hi')
Response | json 
 
res.json({ a: 2 })
